extendedInfo.description: Inspirational quotes from Mahatma Gandhi, Mother Teresa, Aung San Suu Kyi, Dr. A.P.J.Abdul Kalam, Bill Gates, Steve Jobs, Warren Buffet, Dirubhai Ambani and Michael Jackson. Includes significant quotes from the legends and brief about their life history    This app will be an apt source to provide inspiration from celebrities of numerous fields including technology, service, politics, business and media. Get inspired and start inspiring your mates with motivational thoughts. The features of the app  - You can browse through the quotes and share it with your friends through facebook,twitter,instagram,.... - Options to merge 2 or 3 quotes while sharing - Save favourite quotes and review at your convenience. Kind Note:  To support our development, we are inserting ads into all our free apps. Out of the revenue generated from the ads,  5%. will be used for child welfare in promoting education. Thanks for all your support and encouragementKeywords:quotes,quotations,phrases,life quotes, success quotes, inspirational quotes,  inspirational quotes, life phrases

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Should add some more peoples spacialy philosophers.
